column4: i swear every *nix needs to come with an advanced instructor for new users.. i wish i knew a local expert.. "insert cd, open instructor package, just add water..'  poof.. someone to teach you all things *nix
i finally got smart.. i have a win host os and guest ubuntu os using virtualbox
smart would be an ubuntu host and win guest :)
don't want to risk my pre-installed win.. be that might be the direction i go.. ubuntu host, win guest
